metadata.name: Dopamine [The Reward Hormone]
metadata.description:
Dopamine ( C8H11NO2 ) is an organic chemical compound from the catecholamine and phenethylamine families.

 Dopamine functions as a hormone and neurotransmitter and has an important role in the body and brain. and is also known as the "reward/motivation hormone" because it contributes to feelings such as, motivation, focus, happiness, reward, alertness.

Strawberries can also boost dopamine production in the body.

How to increase Dopamine :
-mediate, 
-create something art music, writing.
-food rich in L-tyrosine.
-long term goals.
